description: Combined status change and checkbox update into single protocol with 3 mandatory steps for Done

fixes.description: Rewrote status change rules to make Done transition a 3-step mandatory protocol: 1) update_issue with checkboxes, 2) create_comment, 3) change status. Made checkbox update FIRST step so it can't be skipped.

upgrade_notes: Done transition now explicitly 3 steps in exact order
Step 1 is checkbox update - can't be skipped
Clear WRONG vs CORRECT examples inline
Checkbox update is now part of status change protocol, not separate section
